name: Real-time-bus transit data using API
description: For this project, I decided to caption real-life transit data from Halifax Transitâ€™s open data. This data is used by Google and other third-party developers to create apps for public use.

name: WORLD DICTIONARY
description: WORLD DICTIONARY is an interactive web atlas built with JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and JSON. It features a form on the main page for selecting countries, displaying their flags and information, with options to switch between kilometers and miles. A click on the main page leads to a Wikipedia lookup for in-depth country details. This compact webpage serves as both an educational resource and a showcase of web development skills.
